page.title: 12A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: My day starts at 6.45 when the alarm on the clock buzzes,the house is still peacefull,so time to use the bathroom and not rush,then I put on the kettle for a cup of tea.I take one up for my wife,who then wakes up the boys to come down to breakfast which is cereal.At 8am I set off for work. At the present time I am renovating a 16th century farm house and building a 250ft.boundary wall around the garden. The tools needed for this job are spirit level,trowel and line,at 10-30 my labourer and I stop for 1/4hr.tea break.My labourer mixes the cement and puts it on pieces of wood called spots.Lunch at 1pm which is sandwiches and a flsk of tea.Lay more bricks from 1.30 to 4.30 then home for a shower. Tea then watch the TV news and weather then I find a job in the garden,then watch TV until 10-30,bed.
